original_text: Then he said to me, ‘Son of man, this is what the Almighty Lord says: These are the rules about the altar. On the day that it is ready to use, the priests will offer burnt offerings on it. They will also splash blood from the sacrifices on it.
korean_text: 그가 내게 이르시되 인자야 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 이 제단을 만드는 날에 그 위에 번제를 드리며 피를 뿌리는 규례는 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: this is what the Almighty Lord says
These are the rules about the altar
On the day that it is ready to use
the priests will offer burnt offerings on it
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 그 위에 번제를 드릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will also splash blood from the sacrifices on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그 위에 제물의 피를 뿌릴 것이다
